705504f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lorraine Street - Hicks Street
705504f-a.text:
105-7 Lorraine Street, north side, between Hicks and
Henry Streets. In the baclground are houses on Bush Street.
June 25, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
705504f-a.folder: Lorraine Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

705503f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lorraine Street - Hicks Street
705503f-a.text:
81-85 Lorraine Street, north side, 100 ft. west of Hicks
Street (right, not shown). In the center of the view is seen
No. 83 which is partially located in t he rear of two homes and
contains a front garden which is unusual for this area.
June 9, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIOS.
705503f-a.folder: Lorraine Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
